TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlWriter extends System.Object
public ref class XamlWriter abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一个静态 方法（多次重载），该方法可用于以受限的 XAML 序列化方式，将所提供的运行时对象序列化为 XAML 标记。

span.span: Provides a single static method (multiple overloads) that can be used for limited XAML serialization of provided run-time objects into XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此方法的序列化具有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用的序列化显式运行时，并不有权访问可能的设计时信息在原始 XAML 中 （如果有）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化限制的 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 调用不允许在部分信任环境中运行时。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. 这包括从 Xbap。This includes from XBAPs. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化到字符串使用类。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 字符串然后反序列化回使用静态方法类。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]

summary.span: 直接或通过用于序列化指定对象的中间对象返回 XAML。

span.span: Returns XAML either directly or through an object intermediary that serializes the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Save(object obj) cil managed
Public Shared Function Save (obj As Object) As String

param.name: obj

span.span: The element to be serialized.

param.span: 通常，这是页面或应用程序的根元素。

span.span: Typically, this is the root element of a page or application.

summary.span: 返回用于序列化指定对象及其属性的 XAML 字符串。

span.span: Returns a XAML string that serializes the specified object and its properties.

returns.span: 可以写入流或文件的 XAML 字符串。

span.span: A XAML string that can be written to a stream or file.

returns.span: 将序列化位于提供的 元素下面的所有元素的逻辑树。

span.span: The logical tree of all elements that fall under the provided element will be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此方法的序列化具有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用的序列化显式运行时，并不有权访问可能的设计时信息在原始 XAML 中 （如果有）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化限制的 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 调用不允许在部分信任环境中运行时。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化到字符串使用类。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 字符串然后反序列化回使用静态方法类。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]

summary.span: 将 XAML 信息保存到指定流中，以便序列化指定对象及其属性。

span.span: Saves XAML information into a specified stream to serialize the specified object and its properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此方法的序列化具有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用的序列化显式运行时，并不有权访问可能的设计时信息在原始 XAML 中 （如果有）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化限制的 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 调用不允许在部分信任环境中运行时。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化到使用类。The following example serializes a into a using the class. 流然后反序列化回使用静态方法类。The stream is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]
